reviewComments: This place makes a great port and it pairs well with their chocolate. Very good combination they had, and the other wines were equally as good.
Amista Vineyards.knownFor: “ a perfect spot for a wine country picnic/tasting ” Reviewed July 6, 2008 Amista is a great stop for a picnic when you are out wine tasting. It's about 4 to 5 miles from downtown Healdsburg in the Dry Creek Valley, has great wines, really friendly workers/owners and a beautiful picnic area in the vineyards. I live in Healdsburg and this is where I love to take my visitors for a great experience... More Helpful? Thank galeriacorazon Report
